Reviews.Title: So far, so good
Reviews.Author: SpongeSteve
Reviews.Content: Delivered promptly, item as described. So far we are happy with everything. camera is very nice, just taking time to figure out all of the features.

Reviews.Title: Was pleased!
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: I thought all items were nice.  I'm glad I purchased as a kit.  Would like to have had a backpack or camera case versus bag.

ProductInfo.Features:
KIT INCLUDES 14 PRODUCTS -- All BRAND NEW Items with all Manufacturer-supplied Accessories + Full USA Warranties:
<1> Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens + <2> Canon EF 75-300mm III Lens + <3> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card +
<4> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <5> Spare LP-E8 Battery + <6> Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter +
<7> Additional Vivitar 58mm UV Glass Filter + <8> PD 2.5x Tele & .45x Wide Lens + <9> Precision Design DSLR300 Flash + <10> PD Digital SLR Camera Case +
<11> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <12> PD 6pc Complete Cleaning Kit + <13> PD Memory Card Storage Wallet + <14> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i Digital SLR Camera Body & EF-S 18-55mm IS II Lens with 75-300mm III Lens + 64GB Card + Battery + Case + Tele/Wide Lens Kit + Accessory Kit
